channel.title: Java on 空影星辉
channel.description: Recent content in Java on 空影星辉

item.title: Linux 系统中安装 Java 21
item.description: 下载 Java 21 1 wget https://download.oracle.com/java/21/latest/jdk-21_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz 解压 Java 17 1 sudo tar xvf jdk-21_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz -C /usr/local 配置环境变量 1 sudo vim /etc/profile.d/ecs.sh 1 2 3 # JAVA 21 export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/jdk-21.0.1 export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin 刷新环境变量 1 source /etc/profile 验证是否安装成功 1 java -version
